```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(readr)

```

```{r import}
pay_2020 <- read_csv('data/pay_complete.csv')
stats_2019 <- read_csv('data/stats_complete_2018.csv')
stats_2020 <- read_csv('data/stats_complete.csv')
```

```{r}
stats_2020 %>% mutate('season' = 2020)
stats_2019 %>% mutate('season' = 2019)

combined_stats <- stats_2020 %>%
  bind_rows(stats_2019)
```
